roleset.name: break through barriers, literally or metaphorically

role.descr: thing achieved, gotten, accomplished, barrier broken through

example.name: Arg1 & TMP
example.text: New breakthroughs in medicine are happening every day.

example.name: Arg1 pre-relation
example.text: John had a spiritual breakthrough and converted to Zen Buddhism.

roleset.note: Roleset based on breakthrough.01, OntoNotes grouping breakthrough-n senses 1 & 3; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire.

example.text: This novel was her real breakthrough into the New York literary scene.
example.arg: into the New York literary scene

example.name: Arg1 as "for" PP
example.text: The labor union's concession on pay was a key breakthrough for the negotiations.
